recent.title: Belazy Landing Page
recent.descrip: Belazy Landing Page PSD to HTML work using HTML/CSS (SASS), JavaScript and a slick carousel implemented

recent.title: Irvas Landing Page
recent.descrip: Website/Landing Page for Irvas using HTML/CSS/JS with modals, tabs, calculator, forms, timer, popups and Google Maps. Fully responsive and bundeled using Gulp/Webpack.

recent.title: Newsletter Heroku App
recent.descrip: A Mailchimp Newsletter sign up page using Node.js, Express, body-parser, request, Bootstrap and deployed on heroku.

recent.title: EJS To-Do
recent.descrip: A Simple To-do list using EJS wth Express, body-parser, modules, HTML/CSS/JS and views. New items are added to the MongoDB Atlas using Mongoose and can be deleted as well.

recent.title: EJS Blog
recent.descrip: Basic Blog functionality using EJS, Express.js, Node.js, body-parser, Lodash, CSS/JS and Bootstrap. New items are added to the MongoDB Atlas using Mongoose and can be deleted as well.

recent.title: ToDoster ionic/Angular App
recent.descrip: CRUD To-do cross-platform app using Ionic Framework/Angular with a Firebase Authentication and a side-menu navigation. Ready to be used on Android and iOS.

personal.title: PokeDex ionic/Angular App
personal.descrip: Ionic 4/Angular App using PokéAPI the RESTful Pokémon API with a side-menu navigation, infinite-scroll and swipe-refresh. You can search for pokemons and see details about them.

personal.title: JavaScript Shopping Cart
personal.descrip: Simple shopping cart functionality, where page content is fetched from a local JSON and dynamically displayed on the home page. All the products and the cart content is stored in the local storage.

personal.title: Bootstrap Tindog Landing page
personal.descrip: Simple Tindog Landing page using Bootstrap.

personal.title: MovieApp ionic/Angular App
personal.descrip: Ionic 4/Angular Movie App with an OMDb API implemented and a side-menu navigation. You can search for movies and see their details (plot, rating, actors, genre).

personal.title: Yoga Tours Landing Page
personal.descrip: Yoga Tours Landing Page using HTML/CSS, Less and JavaScript. Contains tabs, slider carousel, timer, modals made with JavaScript from scratch. Project is bundled using Webpack and Babel.

personal.title: ActiveBox Landing Page
personal.descrip: ActiveBox Landing page using HTML/CSS, Sass, jQuery from a PSD template. Fully responsive, contains animations and a reviews carousel.

personal.title: Skinali Landing Page
personal.descrip: Skinali Factory Landing page using HTML/CSS, Sass, jQuery from a PSD template. Fully responsive, contains animations and has a before/after slider combined with a slick carousel.

personal.title: CV/Resume
personal.descrip: CV/Resume web page made with CSS and HTML.

fun.title: Rock Paper Scissors
fun.descrip: Rock Paper Scissors game using HTML/CSS and JavaScript. User makes his selection and the computer responds with a random selection in a modal window.

fun.title: Simon Game
fun.descrip: Simon Game using HTML/CSS/JS and jQuery, where each level you have to repeat all the steps you did before.

fun.title: Dice Game
fun.descrip: Dice Game using JavaScript, which randomly shows dices and finds the winner.

fun.title: Dad Jokes Generator
fun.descrip: Dad Jokes Generator using JavaScript and icanhaz API.

fun.title: Drum Kit
fun.descrip: A Drum Kit using JavaScript, which can play sounds by either clicking on the buttons or pressing keys on the keyboard.

fun.title: Tile Calculator
fun.descrip: Simple and very easy to implement Tile Calculator using JavaScript.

fun.title: Java Script Slider
fun.descrip: Very simple and easy to add JavaScript Slider with arrows and pagination dots navigation.
